name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 7, Kiev.

Comrades of Ukrainian International Volunteer Army soldier Peng Chenliang followed his last wish and placed his photo on Kiev's Independence Square.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution: Now there are stone piers everywhere in Zhuhai, not just in front of the school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, without the students' knowledge, China Construction Bank illegally opened bank cards for students from Shanghai Jiao Tong University who were volunteers for the "China International College Student Innovation Competition" to boost their performance, and threatened the students to accept the subsidies that should have been paid.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution: On December 11, a female truck driver died suddenly in her car in Jiulong District, Chongqing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 12, a water tanker exploded in Sujiatun District, Shenyang, Liaoning Province.
Official report: One person suffered burns. Preliminary investigation revealed that the driver’s improper operation caused a gas flash explosion caused by the anti-rust paint remaining in the tank volatilizing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Contributions from netizens: Now scammers have begun to defraud in the name of distributing special poverty alleviation funds. The fund distribution notices used for fraud are made to look like formal official documents and are marked as confidential.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of December 12, Wenzhou, Zhejiang. A car in Cangnan County ran over two people and then fled. After the incident, the driver fled the scene.
According to reports, the driver has been arrested, one person died and one was injured.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a woman from Linyi, Shandong was detained by a large group of police and special police at the station on her way to Beijing for medical treatment. The police prevented her from taking the train to Beijing for medical treatment simply because there were previous administrative review documents in her suitcase.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 13, Yu Donglai published a post about the goals that Pang Donglai will pursue in the next few years: working less than 36 hours a week, closing on Saturdays, and taking 40 to 60 days off a year! The minimum monthly net income of employees will remain above 8,000 yuan!
If these can be achieved, the minimum income of Pang Donglai employees will exceed the per capita disposable income of 7,069 yuan in Shanghai, far exceeding the median income of 5,500 yuan in Beijing and Shanghai.
Not to mention the cost behind the high wages in Beijing and Shanghai that has not been taken into account: overtime work.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 13, only children can apply for a maximum of 20 days of "paid care leave". Everyone, go and apply for it and give it a try?
Netizens mocked in the comment section: The state has its own laws, and the factory has its own rules! Has the two-day weekend been implemented? Will there still be work after returning? Is it only for civil servants?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution On December 11, Mianyang Middle School Experimental School forced all students to sign the "Special Management Regulations", indicating that students "voluntarily" accept strict management. If they do not sign, they will be ordered to go home to review and be criticized by the grade. Once signed, they will be deprived of the freedom to leave the school on weekends. The regulations list behaviors such as dating between men and women and bringing MP3s as major violations of discipline at the same level as bullying and fighting. It also requires students to have a healthy mentality, otherwise it is also a major violation of discipline. In addition, students must arrive at school at 7.10 and stand and read aloud until 7.30, and are required to be absolutely quiet during evening self-study and not bring puffed food, otherwise it is a violation of discipline.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 13th, Wuzhong, Ningxia, a group of stray dogs attacked a passing child
In most rural areas of the country, and even in some urban areas, there are a large number of stray dogs and unattended free-range dogs, which pose a great threat to the safety of ordinary people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, many places such as Handan, Hebei and Shanghai have begun to put sweaters on street trees.
But in China, there are children of sanitation workers who have a monthly salary of only 700 and have frozen to death, some people are facing freezing to death due to unpaid wages, and some people are suffocated to death by setting up stalls and burning charcoal for warmth for a few pieces of silver.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Not only Hebei and Shanghai, but also Binzhou, Changyuan and other places have wrapped the trees in sweaters.
Netizens in the comment area under the relevant video complained: I don’t feel warm, only cold. They really don’t treat taxpayers’ money as money. Can they do something useful? It is suggested to build a house for the tree and turn on the heating. The people of Binzhou must be very rich, right?
The comment area prompts everyone to search: Emperor Yang of Sui wrapped the tree in silk. Everyone knows what happened after Emperor Yang of Sui.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 14, the South Korean National Assembly held a plenary session, and the impeachment of Yoon Seok-yeol was passed, and Yoon Seok-yeol's presidential office was immediately suspended.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Gu Xiaohu, a villager in Huainan, Anhui, drove a small truck to a nearby gas station to buy 1,500 yuan of diesel and transported it back to refuel farm machinery for autumn harvest. On the way back, he was detained by the transportation department on suspicion of "unauthorized road transportation of dangerous goods without obtaining a dangerous goods road cargo transportation license" and was required to pay a fine of 30,000 yuan within a month. In order to pay the fine, Gu Xiaohu used 18,000 yuan from selling rice and 12,000 yuan borrowed money to pay the fine.
